name: ProAltus Group
description: ProAltus Group delivers access‑led safety solutions—fall protection, rope access, debris containment, façade and roof maintenance—ensuring safe, compliant, and practical work-at-height services.

name: Access Strategy & Design
serviceType: Site surveys, access route planning, compliance consulting
description: Bespoke planning and design for safe and compliant access, including site surveys, stakeholder collaboration and route mapping for long‑term asset management.

name: Fall Protection
serviceType: Design, supply, installation, testing & certification of fall protection systems
description: Complete fall protection services from strategy and consultancy through to permanent system supply, installation, inspection, certification and remediation.

name: Rope Access Services
serviceType: IRATA-certified inspection, maintenance and repairs using rope access techniques
description: Cost-effective, precision rope-access solutions delivered by IRATA-qualified teams, compliant with BS 7985 and UK work-at-height regulations.

name: Façade & Building Envelope
serviceType: Cleaning, maintenance, inspection and repairs of façades
description: One-off repairs, planned preventive maintenance and scheduled inspections of facades and building envelopes, ensuring safety and quality.

name: Roof Maintenance & Repairs
serviceType: Roof inspection, maintenance and repair across tile, slate and flat systems
description: Expert roofing services—including full replacements and support for other trades—compliant with BS 5534/8612, using safe access and fall protection.

name: Emergency Works
serviceType: Swift emergency intervention for fall protection, facade, roof and water ingress issues
description: Rapid response teams for urgent work-at-height issues including testing, inspections, repairs and water ingress detection, with professional reporting and guidance.

name: Bespoke Netting & Debris Containment
serviceType: Design and implementation of netting systems for debris and bird protection
description: Tailored netting and debris containment solutions designed for public and operational environments to maintain safety and continuity.

name: Façade Cleaning and Decoration – Mayfair, London
description: Rope access weed removal and window decoration on a historic building in Mayfair. Delivered under license with minimal disruption, using temporary anchors and DOFF cleaning. Work aligned with local authority standards.

name: Shopping Centre Debris Containment – Midlands
description: Bespoke netting solution installed to protect shoppers and retail operations during overhead maintenance. Engineered containment aligned with BS EN 1263 and Work at Height Regulations 2005.

name: Anchor System Testing and Remediation – London Multi-Site
description: Inspection and remediation of fixed fall protection systems across several high-rise London properties. Testing to BS 7883:2019 with full certification and client reporting.
